name: Beast Master
description: Hi, I'm Tanner aka Crazytm24 aka OneMannGames. This is my first game jam. I have been super excited to participate in this jam and hope you all enjoy my game. My game development path started about 7 months ago, but I’ve been playing and enjoying games my whole life. I'm about to graduate from University with a Computer Science degree and have ambitions to join the Video Game development industry.
